Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Chicago. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
